original_text: But there is a God in heaven. He explains secret things. In your dream, he has shown you what will happen in future years. Now I will tell you the dream and the visions that you had while you lay on your bed.
korean_text: 오직 은밀한 것을 나타내실 이는 하늘에 계신 하나님이시라 그가 느부갓네살 왕에게 후일에 될 일을 알게 하셨나이다 왕의 꿈 곧 왕이 침상에서 머리 속으로 받은 환상은 이러하니이다

sentences.original_text: But there is a God in heaven.
In your dream, he has shown you
what will happen in future years.
Now I will tell you the dream
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 내가 당신에게 그 꿈을 말해드리겠습니다

sentences.original_text: and the visions that you had
while you lay on your bed.
